description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The opposing team smells awful so it is time to change their scent.  Choose to be fresh and clean with the Spicers or stinky and stenchy with the Skunkers.   Use your scent bombs, rockets and nukes to battle through 10 stages while leveling up your team.   Also, scent weapons have healing powers if teammates start to smell rank.
description.short: The opposing team smells awful so it is time to change their scent.  Choose to be fresh and clean with the Spicers or stinky and stenchy with the Skunkers.   Use your scent bombs, rockets and nukes to battle through 10 stages while leveling up your team.   Also, scent weapons have healing powers if teammates start to smell rank.
